review.title: Sakar
review.desc: Reading all the information on the menu in my own language made me feel better and more valuable, and I enjoyed a sincere and comfortable service without any communication problems.

review.title: Rozhan
review.desc: Honestly, I never thought that adding/removing items from my list and sending orders directly to the waiter without calling a waiter could be this easy and fun.
